Best Recipies.name: Vietnamese Pho
Best Recipies.description: A savory vietnamese soup dish containing rice noodles, broth, herbs, and meat of your choice. Delicious!

Meats and other Animal Products.name: Thin sliced Beef (Ribeye Steak is delicious!)

Other Ingredients.name: Rock Sugar
Other Ingredients.quantity: 2-3 Large Chunks or to desired sweetness

Using a Stockpot: First be sure to prep the vegetables. Rinsing them with water is just fine. Chop ends off of yellow onion. Chop the green onion for use later as it is a topping. Peel the ginger with a potato peeler
Toast your yellow onion and ginger until there is a small amount of char on each side. Toast spices, with the exception of the salt, until aromatic
Bring enough water to cover all the meat you intend use by an inch to a boil. Bones, flank streak, oxtail and tripe if used. Boil meat for 10 mins to clean them
Once meat is boiled, clean stock pot and fill with fresh water. Add meat, yellow onion and ginger, and aromatics
Add 8 TBL spoons of fish sauce, rock sugar and the sea salt. When the Pho is done you can add more fish sauce to taste
Bring soup to a boil and then immediately turn down to a simmer.

Simmer for 12-16 hours uncovered. You will need to remove the frothy accumilate that will form on the top of the soup. You will also need to top off the soup with fresh water when it gets low. Just return it to the origional height
I highly recommend leaving it alone; however, if you must stir, DO SO GENTLY! Stiring can make things come apart, making the soup harder to strain
When time is up, remove flank streak and shred. Cook rice noodles according to directions on package. Rinse in cold water when they are done to stop the cooking process
Place noodles in bowl. Put RAW thin sliced ribeye over the noodles. Turn off heat to broth. With at strainer over the bowl, ladle the broth into the bowl. The broth will cook the ribeye
Add thin slices of white onion, the chopped green onion, some of the shredded flank steak and the basil
Using a pressure Cooker: First be sure to prep the vegetables. Rinsing them with water is just fine. Chop ends off of yellow onion. Chop the green onion for use later as it is a topping. Peel the ginger with a potato peeler
Toast your yellow onion and ginger until there is a small amount of char on each side. Toast spices, with the exception of the salt, until aromatic
Fill the bowl of the pressure cooker halfway. Cut the amount of ingredients by half. YOU DO NOT WANT TO OVERFILL YOUR PRESSURE COOKER
Given that there are different sizes and sytle pressure cookers, you will have to do some experimening. PLEASE START WITH HALF THE INGREDIENTS
Add 8 TBL spoons of fish sauce, rock sugar and the sea salt. When the Pho is done you can add more fish sauce to taste
Firmly secure the bulkhead (lid), ensure that steam cannot escape, and set the cookers to you soup setting for 1.5-2 hours
When time is up, remove flank streak and shred. Cook rice noodles according to directions on package. Rinse in cold water when they are done to stop the cooking process
Place noodles in bowl. Put RAW thin sliced ribeye over the noodles. With at strainer over the bowl, ladle the broth into the bowl. The broth will cook the ribeye
Add thin slices of white onion, the chopped green onion, some of the shredded flank steak and the basil

Best Recipies.name: Ground Beef stroganoff
Best Recipies.description: A variation of a very tasty russian dish with ground beef and egg noodles

Meat.name: Ground Beef
Meat.quantity: 1 lb. You can add more if you like alot of meat

Spices.name: Black Pepper
Spices.quantity: To taste or start with 1 Tsp

Spices.name: Salt
Spices.quantity: To taste or start with 1 Tsp

Spices.name: Paprika
Spices.quantity: To taste or start with 1 Tsp

Spices.name: Garlic Powder
Spices.quantity: To taste or start with 1 Tsp

Spices.name: Onion Powder
Spices.quantity: To taste or start with 1 Tsp

Spices.name: Cumin (optional)
Spices.quantity: To taste or start with 1 Tsp

Spices.name: Cayenne Pepper (optional)
Spices.quantity: To taste or start with 1 Tsp

Stove Top: Place frying pan on medium low heat. Oil pan.
Add ground beef and season to taste. Once the ground beef is cooked completely, taste to make sure you like it! Otherwise add more seasoning
Add 1 can of cream of mushroom soup stir in
Simmer for 5-8 mins. Meanwhile cook egg noodles according to directions.
Once the meat is cooked, remove from heat. add noodels.
